content: the crochet healing stitches ii afghan is the sister blanket to the healing stitches square afghan 1 this time i created a ftm from the middle rectangle shaped blanket with lots of different colors definitely outside my personal comfort zone last month i found so much joy in crochet and blending different stitch combinations that i wanted to keep going so i knew a rectangle was just what was needed next there are just as many magical healing stitches in this one as in the original also i m not very good at choosing colors but i have found some really good inspiration by using websites with color palettes i really enjoy sites like color palette ideas that uses photographs as color inspirations 1 https //thecrochetcrowd com/crochet-healing-stitches-afghan/
